Title: The Little Drummer Boy
Genre: Animation, Short, Drama, Family, Fantasy, Musical
Director: Jules Bass, Arthur Rankin Jr., Takeya Nakamura
Actors: José Ferrer, Paul Frees, June Foray, Ted Eccles
Plot: Animated film version of the legendary song of a boy who lets out all his frustrations on a drum, little knowing how significant this drum will be in the birth of the newborn Jesus.
